content: rag doll rainbow bunny materials used - worsted weight yarn i used bernat premium - 5mm hook - stuffing for head only - s>tch marker - darning needle size - ~ 32 cm tall abbrevia2ons - mc = magic chain - chain = chain - slip_stitch = slip s>tch - single_crochet = single_crochet - double_crochet = double_crochet - increase = increase - decrease = decrease - inv decrease = invisible decrease feel free to make items to sell as the pamern designer i would appreciate you giving me credit for the pamern angela_young@me com happy croche>ng arms x 2 in light beige… round 1 start with a mc with 5sc round 2 increase single_crochet x2 increase 8 round 3 4 single_crochet around 8 switch to grey round 5 - 12 single_crochet around 8 fold and close with 3 single_crochet across leave tail for sewing on later legs for first leg… for second leg… in grey… in light beige… round 1 start with a mc with 5sc round 1 start with a mc with 5sc round 2 increase single_crochet x2 increase 8 round 2 increase single_crochet x2 increase 8 rounds 3 12 single_crochet around 8 rounds 3 5 8 switch to green fold and close with 3 single_crochet across weave in ends rounds 6 12 single_crochet around 8 fold and close with 3 single_crochet across weave in ends 1 ears for first ear… for second ear… in light blue… in grey… round 1 start with a mc with 6sc round 1 start with a mc with 6sc round 2 increase single_crochet around 9 round 2 increase single_crochet around 9 round 3 increase single_crochet 2 around 12 round 3 increase single_crochet 2 around 12 round 4 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 round 4 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 rounds 5 6 single_crochet around 15 switch to green rounds 5 10 single_crochet around 15 rounds 7 10 single_crochet around 15 round 11 inv decrease single_crochet 3 x 3 12 round 11 inv decrease single_crochet 3 x 3 12 round 12 inv decrease single_crochet 2 x 3 9 round 12 inv decrease single_crochet 2 x 3 9 do not fasten_off conrnue with head do not sew sides together but fasten_off and weave in ends head round 1 crochet the ears together as follows fold the sides of the grey ear together so the last srtch made is to the right increase single_crochet 2 increase across fold the other ear together with the seam facing inward increase single_crochet 2 increase across the two ears will now be joined together 12 round 2 ch1 in the loops facing you place 1 single_crochet in each of the 12 srtches do not go through both loops turn your work and place 12 more single_crochet in the remaining loops slip_stitch to join 24 conrnue in the round rounds 3 5 single_crochet around 24 round 6 single_crochet 18 only 18 *start here for round 7 to ensure the join is in the back of the head switch to light beige
